website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers GOrun Focus is, generally, welcomed by the majority of the consumers.  People admired its fit, comfort level, and style. Aside from its design, many users were made happy and contented because of its fantastic toe box. Though one of the buyers expressed his disappointment toward the shoe's poor cushioning, the Skechers GOrun Focus is still lauded by many because of its amazing performance on the roads.
pros: Some of the users said that the Skechers GOrun Focus is comfortable
The majority of the purchasers are pleased with the slip-on feature of the GOrun Focus
According to one of the testers, it has a stretchable upper
A good number of consumers appreciated the wide toe box
Several buyers said that it fits perfectly with them
One of the users loved the shoe's excellent arch support
cons: Based on a review, the shoe has poor cushioning underfoot

customer_reviews.title: No tongue
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen a shoe without a tongue. Most unique construction makes it awkward to put on each shoe. Once the shoes are on and laces done up, they are VERY comfortable even for a wide foot. The sale price makes them an incredible buy.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Silverstein

customer_reviews.title: Not good for work if you're heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but not to work in. I'm 280 they'll last about three weeks if you work in them .but just everyday wear comfortable yes they are definitely a buy
customer_reviews.author: Poppa78

customer_reviews.title: Amazing running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These sketchers are just amazing. The upper enclosure is really soft and it is made entirely of cloth type soft material. You have strings which make up for superior fit. The heel is about an inch - inch and a half. The sole is super soft, has a bouncy feel and has cushion in the sole and it is as comfortable as it should be! At a price of $42 these are one of the best running/everyday shoes one can get at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Adesai

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: These shoes ran a little bigger than normal. They were soft. They grey color was not like the picture. It was somewhat shinier.
customer_reviews.author: mommy2boys

customer_reviews.title: Comfy sole but questionable exterior quality
customer_reviews.text: The fabric material on the shoes has creases/wrinkles in it. Makes it look like a knock off pair of shoes. I’m not certain that they’re not knock offs.
customer_reviews.author: Hall Family

customer_reviews.title: Unique!
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow, but I have wide feet. Should stretch once worn awhile. They do not have a normal tongue! It is basically a slip on the laces!
customer_reviews.author: Jens Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have quickly become my favorite pair. I wear them all the time, because they're now the most comfortable shoes I own. They seem to be holding up very well too.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Avilla

customer_reviews.title: watch what you buy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were way to small I couldn't get my foot into them. Vendor for some reason deducted 20.00 off yhe price on my refund
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kendrigan

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I use these sneakers for everyday walking, so far the fit and comfort is great, i would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: geoff evans

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Light
customer_reviews.text: Used these during Physical Therapy and they did well. Nice and light and good support!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Tongue is part of the shoe, more like a slip on.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very comfort, the only issue is the tongue is part of the shoe which can make it a little difficult to get your foot in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for wear with socks.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable, but fit somewhat snug and are apparently to be worn without socks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my husband. This is the second pair of sketchers he owns. Very comfortable and the light gray color is very sharp
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Supercomfy
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. Very comfortable and true to size. Works with my somewhat wider feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: They look great and the feel great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my husband's previous pair of Sketchers running shoes. They fit perfectly, they feel good and he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these Sketches go run shoes; the shoes are comfortable and affordable. My feet feel so much better and I plan on buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Double check the sizes!
customer_reviews.text: USA 10.5 isnt the same across the world. Too small, returned.
customer_reviews.author: Carl brown

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. It provides a lot of cushioning on my heel.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! I did have to replace the laces rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yoga mat comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable inner sole. Perfect for doing a week at Disney world.
customer_reviews.author: Netta

customer_reviews.title: Watch the Bounce
customer_reviews.text: Cushion insole is very springy and almost feels you are walking on a trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W. Masengarb

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear a 10 in skechers Had to return for a 9 an a 1/2
customer_reviews.author: thomas harding

customer_reviews.title: Runs on larger size
customer_reviews.text: Runs larger than other men's skecher sneakers will have to exchange for smaller size. Very nice looking sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: RAR

customer_reviews.title: Skechers Go Run Sneakers for Men
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very comfortable, as expected for a Skechers product. Recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: Delinda Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable workout / walking shoe that I’ve ever owned. Definitely ordering this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco A. Beltran

customer_reviews.title: more cosmetic than functional
customer_reviews.text: I needed them to be real tennis shoes that laced up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Skechers mens 55161 Go Run Focus - 55161
feature_bullets: Ultra Go cushioning is lightweight and responsive
Air Cooled Goga Mat insole for maximum comfort
Breathable mesh upper with suede quarter brace for support
